name: Jetpack Shark: Mega Adventure World
description:
Are you tired of the games that don't keep your skills tested or you excited? Well, you won't be disappointed with this game! With plenty of fast action, fun sound effects, and challenges the only issue you may have is putting it down!

You'll be sure to expect the unexpected when you turn on this app. Using careful strategy, you've got to shoot, jump, and even fly to avoid being hit by obstacles that are trying to take you out of your game. Pick up your gold coins along the way to help you power-up and keep going!

The longer you play, the harder and more challenging the game gets. But that's just what makes it so much fun! Use your points to buy accessories to help you get even further and fight harder. You can do this! Just tap and jump to shoot and enjoy the easy controls and amazingly colorful graphics.

Just be careful...you might get addicted!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
